data.subject: Diamonds And Pearls (Album Ver.)
data.lyric:
This will be the day
 That you will hear me say
 That I will never run away
 
 I am here for you
 Lo

data.subject: Nothing Compares 2 U (Edit)
data.lyric:
It's been seven hours and thirteen days
 Since you took your love away
 I go out all night and sleep
